features: NEWLY UPGRADED DESIGN: YJ-802 video games has been made more fashionable by the designer's efforts, and the size is more suitable for children's hand size. Make your posture of holding the video game console more comfortable.

ENOUGH POWER FOR ON THE GO: Handheld game console uses a large-capacity 1800mAh battery, enough to support you for 4-6 hours in the field, on a journey, or on transportation. Equipped with type-c cable, support you to play while charging.

200 CLASSIC GAMES: The handheld games has 200 built-in non-repeating classic games, including 6 types of games: puzzle, action, education, sports, leisure, and tabletop. Meanwhile, the game console comes with two 6-in-1 game cards, which will look different from other game consoles.

LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE: The body of the handheld video games is thinner and lighter, without taking up too much space, so that the gameboy fits into your pocket and can be taken out to play anytime and anywhere.

GIFT PACKAGING: Beautiful gift shell packaging, no need for secondary packaging, perfect as a gift for children aged 4-12. And we provide a worry-free guarantee, if your video game machine is non-human caused damage and quality problems, we will provide replacements or refunds until you are satisfied.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The great value Taddtoy handheld console Introducing the Taddtoy Handheld Game Console, a new version of the Taddtoy Game Console YJ-801, optimized for personal, handheld gaming. This video game console is a small, lightweight design that is perfect for on-the-go gaming. If you're looking for a suitable gift for your little one, this is a great choice.

Time Function YJ-802 game machine is designed with a time function. You can adjust the time and date you want according to the time zone you are in. This allows your kids to learn the concept of time while being entertained. 200 Classic 16-bit games and 2 game cartridge Two 6 IN 1 game cards with puzzle and action game themes are included. Assist Buttons We add two assistant buttons on the top of the game console, which can replace the traditional A/B buttons. Adding more fun to the game. In some games or interfaces, it is normal for the secondary buttons to not work, please use the primary buttons.

Package Contains: 1 x Game console1 x User Manual1 x Li-ion Battery1 x Type-C Cable1 x Earphone2 x Game Cards Warm Tips： Before using the product, please read the instructions carefully.The screen is covered with a protective film, you can choose to keep it or tear it off.Without the function to save the progress of the game.
Product size 6.5 x 2.9 x 0.8 inches Item Weight 4.58 ounces Suitable for 4 years and above Warm tips When using the game console for the first time, it is best to fully charge the battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my two grandsons for Christmas, ages 5 and 6. It kept them busy most of the day. They both enjoyed it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the buy for our little guy!
reviews.reviewText: Bought as a gift for our 4 yo grandson. There are so many games to choose from. He likes it because it looks like the control the big kids use. We like it because there are no annoying ads, no buffering when Wi-Fi is low, and no clicking on the wrong button taking you away from the game. He absolutely loves it. The big kids also enjoyed playing the games. Good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Item arrived quickly. It came with a pair of earbuds, 2 cartridges and a charging cord(no box for the cord tho). Once charged it never turned on. This was purchased as a Christmas gift. Needless to say, it was never able to be used because we could never get it to turn on. Even let it charge overnight. While pushing the power button, you could see a red light flash through the little pin hole on the right bottom of the device. Disappointed, but I guess you get what you pay for. Seems like these are a hit or miss. Be aware and purchase at your own risk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the best instructions
reviews.reviewText: The game is okay but it doesn’t have very good instructions. Luckily my daughter has more patience than I do because it’s a lot of trial and error. It has a ton of games. It’s worth the money for a transitional game. The screen is tiny

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Was what we wanted
reviews.reviewText: But it would not charge. I was going to return and lost track of it. Now too late.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The girls had something to keep them busy!
reviews.reviewText: I love the fact it was easy for the girls to learn and play!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for our grandson for Christmas and it was everything we thought. He really likes it and the battery life is really good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for beginner gamers
reviews.reviewText: My four year old wanted a switch like his older brothers but I’m afraid he can’t keep up with it or might break it. This one has been a lifesaver for us. We bought this in hopes that he wouldn’t realize it wasn’t the real thing. It has a good screen quality and stays charged for a little bit without us having to constantly charge it for him. It is made durable and sturdy and he loves that he has games to play that his brothers don’t 😉 Great value for the money.
